title: Isolation
desc:
Post 1135
- You can't read any chats anymore on this server except for your own channel, the info channel, and<#1106231378443505785>. Information that the host deems is necessary for you to know can be screenshoted and placed in your channel (ie: big server announcements which may be important to read, effects from other cards which are significant to you, and the last card played before your turn.)
- You aren't affected by enemy cards. Enemy cards won't consider you a player.
